bibl.title: A Church with No Books and a Reader Who Cannot Write: The Strange Case of P. Oxy. 33.2673. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Discusses P. Oxy. XXXIII, 2673, a declaration of Church property, submitted during the "Great Persecution" in the early fourth century CE. - Documenting the Confiscation. - Enforcing the Edict. - "Because he does not know letters". - Missing Books.
CHOAT Malcolm and Rachel YUEN-COLLINGRIDGE, A Church with No Books and a Reader Who Cannot Write: The Strange Case of P. Oxy. 33.2673. Avec résumé en anglais.
